title: Astroboy 06
creator_credit: Satoshi Yamamoto, Hidehiko Takei and Tezuka Productions
brief_description: Three episodes in the adventures of the boy robot created by Osamu Tezuka. The titles are: ‘Uran’s twin’, ‘Outer spaceport r45’ and ‘The Wreck of the Titan’.
